menu.title: 'Fitness' menu
menu.descr: The 'Fitness' menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. A product of active and healthy people. This is a completely new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: 'Lean' menu
menu.descr: The 'Lean' menu is a careful selection of ingredients: no animal products, milk from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the right amount of protein from tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: 'Premium' menu
menu.descr: In the 'Premium' menu we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - a restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
